content: so simple it s silly scarf size 3 1/2 inches wide and as long as you want materials 1 skein of paton s brilliant or lion brand glitterspun 1 i or 9 crochet hook notes gauge is not important choose a hook that is appropriate for the yarn you ve selected and it will probably be perfect special stitches v-st 1 double_crochet chain 2 1 double_crochet in same space foundation chain 15 row 1 double_crochet in 4th chain from hook and in each chain across 13 dcs first chain 3 counts as first double_crochet throughout copyright 2007 christy hall antichristy all rights reserved pattern and pictures are the property of their creator please do not distribute sell or copy without permission if you like the pattern please link to it pattern row 2 chain 3 * skip 1 double_crochet v-st in next double_crochet skip 1 double_crochet 1 double_crochet in next double_crochet * repeat from * to the end of the row 4 single dcs and 3 v-st row 3 chain 3 *3 double_crochet in chain 2 space 1 double_crochet in next double_crochet* repeat from * to the end of the row 13 stitches made continue in pattern until the desired length is reached ending with row 3 to finish complete 1 row of double_crochet across 13 stitches made fringe it if you like wear it and be fabulous copyright 2007 christy hall antichristy all rights reserved pattern and pictures are the property of their creator please do not distribute sell or copy without permission if you like the pattern please link to it
